title: Travel_website Design
description: This project Designed and developed a user-friendly travel website that allows users to search and book flights, hotels, and packages.

title: Voice-Based App
description: A voice-based React app allows users to interact with the application using voice commands users can interact with the application using their voice, eliminating the need for manual typing.
